package.name: cross-busybox-musl-amd64
package.build: export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/bin:$PATH cd busybox-${PKGVERSION} ARCH=x86 make defconfig sed -i 's/\(CONFIG_\)\(.*\)\(INETD\)\(.*\)=y/# \1\2\3\4 is not set/g' .config sed -i 's/\(CONFIG_IFPLUGD\)=y/# \1 is not set/' .config sed -i 's/# CONFIG_STATIC is not set/CONFIG_STATIC=y/g' .config ARCH=x86 CROSS_COMPILE="x86_64-linux-musl-" make make install x86_64-linux-musl- _install/bin/busybox
